item.title: Alexander add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Music has always been a matter of Energy to me, a question of Fuel. Sentimental people call it Inspiration, but what they really mean is Fuel. I have always needed Fuel. I am a serious consumer. On some nights I still believe that a car with the gas needle on empty can run about fifty more miles if you have the right music very loud on the radio." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Alexander add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I have a theory that the truth is never told during the nine-to-five hours." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Alexander add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Alexander add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx
